definition: a long seat for more than one person, to exhibit on a bench or table
details:
noun
- a long seat for more than one person
- (law) the seat for judges in a courtroom
- a strong worktable for a carpenter or mechanic
= synonyms: workbench, work bench
- persons who administer justice
= synonyms: judiciary
- the reserve players on a team
= example: the reserve players on a team
- a level shelf of land interrupting a declivity (with steep slopes above and below)
= synonyms: terrace
verb
- to exhibit on a bench or table
= example: to exhibit on a bench or table
- to take out of a game
= example: to take out of a game
